Test Name: Cryptococcus Antigen Titer, Lateral Flow Assay (Serum)
Purpose: To detect and quantify Cryptococcus antigen in serum for diagnostic evaluation of cryptococcal infection.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., plain red-top or serum separator tube)
Equipment: Micropipettes with sterile tips, vortex mixer, timer, and lateral flow assay cassette reader
